mapper.select: select distinct year from fb_product_line_budget where 1=1 AND upload_log_id = #{uploadLogId} order by year

with temp_year_1 as ( select * from fb_product_line_budget where year = #{firstYear} and upload_log_id = #{uploadLogId}), temp_year_2 as ( select * from fb_product_line_budget where year = #{secondYear} and upload_log_id = #{uploadLogId}) select temp_year_1.business_division businessDivision, temp_year_1.product_line productLine, temp_year_1.data_version dataVersion, temp_year_1.item_seq itemSeq, temp_year_1.cost_item costItem, temp_year_1.unit unit ${selectColumn} from temp_year_1 left join temp_year_2 on temp_year_1.business_division = temp_year_2.business_division and temp_year_1.product_line = temp_year_2.product_line and temp_year_1.data_version = temp_year_2.data_version and temp_year_1.item_seq = temp_year_2.item_seq order by temp_year_1.item_seq
